pullrequest.title: Supporting prerelease versions of ignition projects

content.raw: It's good to have an example, but the example doesn't fail without this pull request. The real test is in running `make package_source` and verifying that the generated tarball and zip files have the correct name.
content.html: It's good to have an example, but the example doesn't fail without this pull request. The real test is in running make package_source and verifying that the generated tarball and zip files have the correct name.
